main event: On 19 September 1953, a civilian observed four bright lights moving erratically across the sky in Panama City, Florida.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes,The lights were described as moving at high speeds and changing direction suddenly,The observer was the Assistant Fire Chief of the Panama City Fire Department and was considered reliable despite having poor judgment of distances,No physical evidence or photographs were available from the sighting,Local radar reports did not identify any unusual activity in the area during the time of the sighting.
sighted object: four bright lights in the sky
witness description: Assistant Fire Chief, civilian, age 31, considered reliable.
